com.androidex.ui

类 AutoScrollViewPager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.support.v4.view.ViewPager
          • com.androidex.ui.AutoScrollViewPager
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class AutoScrollViewPager
extends android.support.v4.view.ViewPager
    Auto Scroll View Pager
      Basic Setting and Usage
    • startAutoScroll() start auto scroll, or startAutoScroll(int) start auto scroll delayed
    • stopAutoScroll() stop auto scroll
    • setInterval(long) set auto scroll time in milliseconds, default is DEFAULT_INTERVAL
      Advanced Settings and Usage
    • setDirection(int) set auto scroll direction
    • setCycle(boolean) set whether automatic cycle when auto scroll reaching the last or first item, default is true
    • setSlideBorderMode(int) set how to process when sliding at the last or first item
    • setStopScrollWhenTouch(boolean) set whether stop auto scroll when touching, default is true
    作者:
    Trinea 2013-12-30

      scroll only once

      set the factor by which the duration of sliding animation will change while auto scrolling

      • startAutoScroll

        public void startAutoScroll(int delayTimeInMills)
        start auto scroll
        参数:
        delayTimeInMills - first scroll delay time

      • stopAutoScroll

        public void stopAutoScroll()
        stop auto scroll

      • setSwipeScrollDurationFactor

        public void setSwipeScrollDurationFactor(double scrollFactor)
        set the factor by which the duration of sliding animation will change while swiping

      • setAutoScrollDurationFactor

        public void setAutoScrollDurationFactor(double scrollFactor)
        set the factor by which the duration of sliding animation will change while auto scrolling

      • sendScrollMessage

        private void sendScrollMessage(long delayTimeInMills)

      • setViewPagerScroller

        private void setViewPagerScroller()
        set ViewPager scroller to change animation duration when sliding

      • scrollOnce

        public void scrollOnce()
        scroll only once

      • dispatchTouchEvent

        public boolean dispatchTouchEvent(android.view.MotionEvent ev)
          if stopScrollWhenTouch is true
        • if event is down, stop auto scroll.
        • if event is up, start auto scroll again.
        覆盖:
        dispatchTouchEvent 在类中 android.view.ViewGroup

      • getInterval

        public long getInterval()
        get auto scroll time in milliseconds, default is DEFAULT_INTERVAL
        返回:
        the interval

      • setInterval

        public void setInterval(long interval)
        set auto scroll time in milliseconds, default is DEFAULT_INTERVAL
        参数:
        interval - the interval to set

      • getDirection

        public int getDirection()
        get auto scroll direction
        返回:
        LEFT or RIGHT, default is RIGHT

      • setDirection

        public void setDirection(int direction)
        set auto scroll direction
        参数:
        direction - LEFT or RIGHT, default is RIGHT

      • isCycle

        public boolean isCycle()
        whether automatic cycle when auto scroll reaching the last or first item, default is true
        返回:
        the isCycle

      • setCycle

        public void setCycle(boolean isCycle)
        set whether automatic cycle when auto scroll reaching the last or first item, default is true
        参数:
        isCycle - the isCycle to set

      • isStopScrollWhenTouch

        public boolean isStopScrollWhenTouch()
        whether stop auto scroll when touching, default is true
        返回:
        the stopScrollWhenTouch

      • setStopScrollWhenTouch

        public void setStopScrollWhenTouch(boolean stopScrollWhenTouch)
        set whether stop auto scroll when touching, default is true
        参数:
        stopScrollWhenTouch -

      • getSlideBorderMode

        public int getSlideBorderMode()
        get how to process when sliding at the last or first item
        返回:
        the slideBorderMode SLIDE_BORDER_MODE_NONE, SLIDE_BORDER_MODE_TO_PARENT, SLIDE_BORDER_MODE_CYCLE, default is SLIDE_BORDER_MODE_NONE

      • setSlideBorderMode

        public void setSlideBorderMode(int slideBorderMode)
        set how to process when sliding at the last or first item
        参数:
        slideBorderMode - SLIDE_BORDER_MODE_NONE, SLIDE_BORDER_MODE_TO_PARENT, SLIDE_BORDER_MODE_CYCLE, default is SLIDE_BORDER_MODE_NONE

      • isBorderAnimation

        public boolean isBorderAnimation()
        whether animating when auto scroll at the last or first item, default is true
        返回:
        Border Animation status

      • setBorderAnimation

        public void setBorderAnimation(boolean isBorderAnimation)
        set whether animating when auto scroll at the last or first item, default is true
        参数:
        isBorderAnimation -
